name: SARSCoronavirus2AllCombinationLabResults
title: SARS Coronavirus 2, All Combination Lab Results
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to SARS-CoV-2  lab tests that are combined with other lab tests.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of SARS-CoV-2 that is combined with other lab tests (e.g.,SARS coronavirus+SARS coronavirus 2 Ag Respiratory PrThr Pt Ord IA.rapid), with results provided on a qualitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SARS, SARS-like, and SARS-related concepts that do not specifically address SARS-CoV-2. It also excludes lab panels.)

concept.display: SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) identified in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection

contains.display: SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory system specimen by Rapid immunoassay
Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) identified in Respiratory system specimen by NAA with probe detection
